trans-unit.source: Describes the interior of a graphics shape composed of rectangles and paths.
trans-unit.target: Descrive l'area interna di una forma grafica composta di rettangoli e percorsi.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: A region is scalable because its coordinates are specified in world coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Un'area è scalabile poiché le coordinate sono specificate in coordinate globali.

trans-unit.source: On a drawing surface, however, its interior is dependent on the size and shape of the pixels representing it.
trans-unit.target: In una superficie di disegno, tuttavia, è dipendente dalle dimensioni dei pixel che rappresenta tale interna.

trans-unit.source: An application can use regions to clip the output of drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare le aree per visualizzare l'output delle operazioni di disegno.

trans-unit.source: These regions are called clipping regions.
trans-unit.target: Tali aree sono definite aree di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information on using regions for clipping, see [How to: Use Clipping with a Region](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'utilizzo delle regioni per il ritaglio, vedere [procedura: utilizzare il ritaglio con un'area](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An application can also use regions in hit-testing operations, such as checking whether a point or a rectangle intersects a region.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può inoltre utilizzare le aree nelle operazioni di hit test, ad esempio verifica se un punto o un rettangolo interseca un'area.

trans-unit.source: For more information on using regions for hit-testing, see [How to: Use Hit Testing with a Region](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'utilizzo delle regioni per l'hit test, vedere [How to: Use Hit Testing con un'area](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An application can fill a region by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRegion%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può riempire un'area con il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRegion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo) e un <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRegion%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with an infinite interior.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza un nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.Region>con una parte interna infinita.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo crea un nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.Region>con un <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> </xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: The new region is defined as the interior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> specified by the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: La nuova area è definita come l'area interna del <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>specificato per il `path` parametro.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that defines the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> che definisce la nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> dai dati specificati.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with an interior defined by an existing <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo crea una nuova <xref:System.Drawing.Region>con una parte interna definita da un <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.</xref:System.Drawing.Region> esistente</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: The `rgnData` parameter is an array that contains the definition of an existing <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
trans-unit.target: Il `rgnData` parametro è una matrice che contiene la definizione di un <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.</xref:System.Drawing.Region> esistente

trans-unit.target: Questo metodo crea un nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.Region>con una parte interna rettangolare.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: The interior is defined by the `rect` parameter.
trans-unit.target: L'interno è definito per la `rect` parametro.

trans-unit.target: Aggiorna questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> per contenere la parte dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> struttura che non si interseca con questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Aggiorna questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> per contenere la parte dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> che non si interseca con questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> complemento all'oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: region is .
trans-unit.target: regionis .

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate da questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Region> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata a Dispose consente le risorse usate da questo <xref:System.Drawing.Region>riallocazione per altri scopi.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia la <xref:System.Drawing.Region>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Drawing.Region>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Drawing.Region>occupata.</xref:System.Drawing.Region> </xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Drawing.Region>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> is identical to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> on the specified drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: Test se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> è uguale a <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> superficie di disegno sull'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The current transformation of the graphics context `g` is used to compute the region interiors on the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: La trasformazione corrente del contesto grafico `g` viene utilizzato per calcolare le parti interne delle aree sulla superficie di disegno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> per eseguire il test.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> che rappresenta un'area di disegno.

trans-unit.source: if the interior of region is identical to the interior of this region when the transformation associated with the g parameter is applied; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se l'area interna di area è identico all'interno di quest'area quando viene associata la trasformazione di g parametro è applicato; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: g or region is .
trans-unit.target: gor region is .

trans-unit.source: Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> per contenere solo la parte interna che non si interseca con il parametro specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to exclude from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> da escludere da questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> per contenere solo la parte interna che non si interseca con il parametro specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure to exclude from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> struttura da escludere da questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struttura da escludere da questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to contain only the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> per contenere solo la parte interna che non si interseca con il parametro specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to exclude from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> da escludere da questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: region is .
trans-unit.target: regionis .

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Consente a un oggetto tentare di liberare risorse ed eseguire altre operazioni di pulizia prima che venga recuperato da garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> from a handle to the specified existing [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] region.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> da un handle specificato esistente [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] area.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Drawing.Region> with an interior defined by the existing <xref:System.Drawing.Region> referred to by the handle in the `hrgn` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo crea un nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.Region>con una parte interna definita da esistenti <xref:System.Drawing.Region>a cui fa riferimento l'handle di `hrgn` parametro.</xref:System.Drawing.Region> </xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: A handle to an existing <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un handle a un oggetto esistente <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents a rectangle that bounds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> on the drawing surface of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struttura che rappresenta un rettangolo che delimita questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> sulla superficie di disegno di un <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The current transformation of the graphics context is used to compute the region interior on the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: La trasformazione corrente del contesto grafico viene utilizzata per calcolare l'area interna di area nell'area di disegno.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle is not always the smallest possible bounding rectangle depending on the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di delimitazione non è sempre il più piccolo rettangolo di delimitazione possibili a seconda della trasformazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> su cui il <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> viene disegnato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure that represents the bounding rectangle for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> on the specified drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> struttura che rappresenta il rettangolo di delimitazione per <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> superficie di disegno sull'oggetto specificato.

trans-unit.source: g is .
trans-unit.target: gis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a Windows handle to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> in the specified graphics context.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un handle Windows per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> nel contesto grafico specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> su cui il <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> viene disegnato.

trans-unit.source: A Windows handle to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un handle Windows per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: g is .
trans-unit.target: gis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData"></xref> that represents the information that describes this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData"> </xref> che rappresenta le informazioni che descrivono questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Region> class allows you to define a custom shape.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Drawing.Region>classe consente di definire una forma personalizzata.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: The shape can be made up of lines, polygons, and curves.
trans-unit.target: La forma può essere costituita da linee, poligoni e curve.

trans-unit.source: GetRegionData describes the shape contained in this <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
trans-unit.target: GetRegionData descrive la forma contenuta in questo <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.</xref:System.Drawing.Region>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData"></xref> that represents the information that describes this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData"> </xref> che rappresenta le informazioni che descrivono questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structures that approximate this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> after the specified matrix transformation is applied.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una matrice di <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> strutture approssimano questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> dopo aver applicata la trasformazione di matrice specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"></xref> that represents a geometric transformation to apply to the region.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix"> </xref> che rappresenta una trasformazione geometrica da applicare all'area.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structures that approximate this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> after the specified matrix transformation is applied.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> strutture approssimano questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> dopo aver applicata la trasformazione di matrice specificato.

trans-unit.source: matrix is .
trans-unit.target: matrixis .

trans-unit.source: Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to the intersection of itself with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> l'intersezione di se stesso con il parametro specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> da intersecare con questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to the intersection of itself with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna questa <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> l'intersezione di se stesso con il parametro specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> structure to intersect with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> si interseca con questa struttura <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Updates this <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to the intersection of itself with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> structure.
